extension.news: - AudioCodecMixin: Don't consider EAC3 >= 640kbit as possible atms - Core/Home: Force plex.direct connectivity check if the current connection has hostname issues (should fix certain setups with manual connections/LAN connections without allowing insecure local connections, falling back to plex.direct) - Settings: Make "Auto-Sync Subtitles" a user setting (was a global one; might need an initial re-toggle) - TV Shows/PlaybackSettings: Allow toggling "Auto-Sync Subtitles" per TV Show (overrides global setting) - Player/Movies: Allow toggling "Auto-Sync Subtitles" during playback - Dropdown: Correctly place shadow - Home/ServerList: Use correct texture for last item (bottom rounded corners) - README: Clarify repository installation instructions - KodiGUI: Be more resilient against timing issues with active dialogs; try reactivating a window if it wasn't activated properly due to active dialogs - Episodes: Fix rare hanging/no-exit state when BGM and playback request ran into a timing issue; this also could lead to the plugin not exiting at all afterwards - Episodes: Allow immediate playback as soon as the current item is loaded - Episodes: Don't block play button in certain rare scenarios - i18n: Update translations for Spanish (100%), French (75%), Chinese (90%), Hungarian (100%), Italian (63%)
